attributes.action: Nominate Phillip Schofield for Prime Minister
attributes.additional_details:
Check any social media for evidence. 
Also, Schofe is a pure gem who knows how to talk to ANYONE
attributes.background: Phillip Schofield, a national treasure, should lead our country especially with Brexit. Not only does he have almost 4,000,000 more followers than current Prime Minister, but also has interviewed enough people to understand the true beliefs of the people of Great Britain.

rejection.details:
In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

https://www.royal.uk/queen-and-government
